title: Ep 290 The Best of Steve Sjuggerud
itunes:title: The Best of Steve Sjuggerud
description: Steve Sjuggerud, editor of True Wealth and True Wealth Systems newsletters for S&A, talks about why U.S. stock will go much higher from here.  He explains why he's bullish on China and why investors should continue to stay clear of Russia and Greece.  Finally, Steve shares his favorite idea - which trades at just 8 times earnings and pays over a 5% yield.
